item.title: AUTO SPDBRK, SPOILERS, and STAB TRIM Lights

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated EICAS message is verified to operate once each flight day.

placard.para: Placard affected light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Cancel all messages from top EICAS.
Open AUTO SPDBRK C/B 11G11.
Ensure amber AUTO SPEEDBRAKE message shows on top EICAS.
Close AUTO SPDBRK C/B 11G11.
Ensure AUTO SPEEDBRAKE message does not show on top EICAS.
Set the EICAS computer selector switch on the EICAS display select panel to AUTO.
Open the following CSEU circuit breakers on the P11 panel:
FLT CONT ELEC-1L-AC (11C6)
FLT CONT ELEC-1R-AC (11G17)
FLT CONT ELEC-2L-AC (11C8)
FLT CONT ELEC-2R-AC (11G27)
Verify that the "SPOILERS" caution message is displayed on the upper EICAS screen.
Close the following CSEU circuit breaker on the P11 panel:
FLT CONT ELEC-1L-AC (11C6)
FLT CONT ELEC-1R-AC (11G17)
FLT CONT ELEC-2L-AC (11C8)
FLT CONT ELEC-2R-AC (11G27)
Verify that the "SPOILERS" caution message is not displayed on the upper EICAS screen.
Provide electrical power (Ref. MM 24-22-00).

warning.para: KEEP ALL PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT CLEAR OF CONTROL SURFACES, CABLES, AND LANDING GEAR AREAS. PRESSURIZATION OF A HYDRAULIC SYSTEM CAN MOVE CONTROL SURFACES, CABLES, LANDING GEAR, AND LANDING GEAR DOORS. MOVEMENT OF CONTROL SURFACES, CABLES, LANDING GEAR, AND LANDING GEAR DOORS CAN CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO EQUIPMENT.

numlitem.para: Provide hydraulic power to the center and right hydraulic systems (Ref. MM 29-11-00).
Make sure the following circuit breakers are closed:
STAB TRIM CONT-R (11H20)
STAB TRIM CONT-L (11H11)
STAB TRIM SHUTOFF-L (11C12)
STAB TRIM SHUTOFF-R (11C13)
L STAB TRIM POS IND (11H10)
R STAB TRIM POS IND (11H19)
Position the C FLT CONTROL SHUTOFF switch and R FLT CONTROL SHUTOFF switch on the right side panel (P61) to ON.
Position the stabilizer between 4 and 14 units.
Position the EICAS computer selector on the forward electronics panel to R.
Position the C STAB TRIM switch on the control stand panel (P10) to NORM.
Position the R STAB TRIM switch on the control stand panel (P10) to CUTOUT.
Trim the stabilizer in the aircraft nose down direction with the wheel mounted thumb switches and verify that the "STAB TRIM" EICAS message displays on the upper EICAS screen.
Position the R STAB TRIM switch on the control stand panel (P10) to NORM.
Trim the stabilizer in the aircraft nose down direction with the wheel mounted thumb switches and verify that the "STAB TRIM" EICAS message does not display on the upper EICAS screen.
Position the EICAS computer selector on the forward electronics panel to NORM.
Remove hydraulic power if it is no longer needed.
Remove electrical power if it is no longer needed.
